title: fried quail’s eggs
description: At its heart this is a really simple dish of fried fish served with beautifully cooked veg, but a deep-fried quail's egg ups the ante.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a spiraliser for the potato-wrapped quail's eggs.
ingredients: 400g/14oz wild mushrooms (preferably a mix of morels, ceps and black trumpets)
150g/5oz purple sprouting broccoli, cut into small florets
1½ bunches baby heritage carrots, in a mix of colours
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 fillets halibut, skin on and pin-boned, seasoned with salt and pepper
